topic: Deep dive: cgitb standard library module in Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: Deep dive: cgitb standard library module in Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deep Dive: cgitb Standard Library Module in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides an overview of the enhanced features and functionalities offered by the cgitb (Command Line Interface to pdb for CGI scripts) standard library module in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Enhanced debugging capabilities for CGI scripts
Improved error messages and stack traces
Integration with the latest pdb features
version_notes: Enhancements and improvements continue with subsequent versions
caveats: Enabling cgitb may expose internal details of your application to the user, potentially causing security concerns.
It's recommended to disable cgitb in production environments.
